              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/KemiBadenoch" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Kemi Badenoch MP</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/KemiBadenoch">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">KemiBadenoch</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Conservative MP for Saffron Walden.  For constituents' queries, pls email me at kemi.badenoch.mp@parliament.uk with your full home address and contact details.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              London, England

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/Xl3fABq2iO" title="http://facebook.com/kemibadenoch">
    facebook.com/kemibadenoch
  </a>

</span>
      </div>



      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="9:16 am - 21 Oct 2015">Joined October 2015</span>
      </div>

  <div class="trends-inner"><div class="flex-module trends-container context-trends-container">
  <div class="flex-module-header">
    
    <h3><span class="trend-location js-trend-location">Worldwide trends</span></h3>
  </div>
  <div class="flex-module-inner">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Best of luck, Sam! You are a dedicated councillor with a strong sense of public service and have done a brilliant job helping to organise the 8Day Weekend &amp; Carnival. You would do Saffron Walden proud as Mayor! <a href="/hashtag/SamForMayor?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SamForMayor</b></a><a href="https://t.co/jJG2DPV5hH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/swtories/status/972112447615262720" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/swtories/status/972112447615262720"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/swtories/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/972112447615262720</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">16</span>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">60</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

    </div>

  </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="961206301853446145" id="stream-item-tweet-961206301853446145" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;961206301853446145&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

    </div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f3a5.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Movie camera" aria-label="Emoji: Movie camera" /> WATCH: Today I launch my campaign to <a href="/hashtag/BanShockCollars?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BanShockCollars</b></a>

Like many other people, I am a dog owner, and I feel very strongly that these devices are barbaric, outdated and unnecessary. 

Support my campaign by signing my UK Parliamentary petition here: <a href="https://t.co/MPdzvubwpa" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.rossthomson.org.uk/ban-electric-shock-collars-campaign" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.rossthomson.org.uk/ban-electric-shock-collars-campaign"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">rossthomson.org.uk/ban-electric-s</span><span class="invisible">hock-collars-campaign</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/lhtFpcwp7m" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/lhtFpcwp7m</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Henry Newman</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Labour's focus on a candidate's race and gender is very sinister.   No policy or debate in their campaign. Just hatred and exclusion.  A positive &amp; dignified response from <a href="/Henry4FrogFitz" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="821035649675493377"><s>@</s><b>Henry4FrogFitz</b></a>  ...will get an Essex contingent down to help you soon!<a href="https://t.co/TuoTfyIone" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/henry4frogfitz/status/956480110634381312" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/henry4frogfitz/status/956480110634381312"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/henry4frogfitz</span><span class="invisible">/status/956480110634381312</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Henry4FrogFitz/status/956480110634381312" data-conversation-id="956480110634381312" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="956480110634381312" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Henry4FrogFitz" data-user-id="821035649675493377" href="/Henry4FrogFitz/status/956480110634381312" data-conversation-id="956480110634381312" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Henry Newman</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Henry4FrogFitz</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Last week Camden Labour told the <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="23521853"><s>@</s><b>NewJournal</b></span> that there's "no place in politics in Camden" for me. It's time to reject this politics of hatred and personal attacks. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/71YX9SFuuF</span></div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Theresa May</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is Fantastic!  Last week I was made a patron of <a href="/cvs_uttlesford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1510412894"><s>@</s><b>cvs_uttlesford</b></a>  and mentioned to the PM what great work they do. Thank you <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> for the recognition and thank you CVSU for your enduring dedication in serving our community this way.  SO PROUD!<a href="https://t.co/dyHVSNap93" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/954379358843613184" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/954379358843613184"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/theresa_may/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/954379358843613184</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Looking forward to reading the full interview in the House Magazine where I talk about my new role encouraging a diverse range of people to become Tory candidates and how Friends was the best sitcom ever! (After Frasier and Brooklyn 99 <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f600.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Grinning face" aria-label="Emoji: Grinning face" />)</p>
</div>

</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">One of the awful things about losing Jo is knowing how much difference she would have made in the world. When the kids wake up this morning Im going to tell them how - even though shes not here - shes still making the world a better place.<a href="https://t.co/qqe4lSjy5g" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-42708507" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-42708507"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-427085</span><span class="invisible">07</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Reversing the surge in unemployment we saw in the recession and getting to record levels of employment is a great thing in itself. But its also made Britain more equal, by lifting the incomes of poorer people more.<a href="https://t.co/IxF2vYufOs" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/951147935932305408" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/951147935932305408"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ONS/status/951</span><span class="invisible">147935932305408</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I was listening intently to the excellent <a href="/KemiBadenoch" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4010545737"><s>@</s><b>KemiBadenoch</b></a> during today's Trade Bill debate, championing food standards and <a href="/RedTractorFood" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="295277986"><s>@</s><b>RedTractorFood</b></a> - which ensures that how food is farmed and prepared is regularly checked by independent experts to make sure it is of a good standard.<a href="https://t.co/z3NI0R15Ol" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/z3NI0R15Ol</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Toby Young</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I've worked with Toby and know he is passionate about getting the best education for disadvantaged kids.  It'a a shame he's had to defend himself in this way, but this is what comes of tweeting while watching telly, <a href="/toadmeister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18809812"><s>@</s><b>toadmeister</b></a> I warned you! <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f600.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Grinning face" aria-label="Emoji: Grinning face" /><a href="https://t.co/XybM4Cgx8Q" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/toadmeister/status/948524998972592128" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/toadmeister/status/948524998972592128"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/toadmeister/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/948524998972592128</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>

      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Toby Young</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>toadmeister</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">This is a thread about the controversy surrounding my appointment to the Office for Students.       <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="936555221639204864" id="stream-item-tweet-936555221639204864" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;936555221639204864&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Unfortunately, all too often a lie gets halfway around the world before the truth gets its trousers on. I hope all those who shared the false story will now share this one!<a href="https://t.co/cW4eQQ3Mob" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/933724504706207744" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/933724504706207744"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/933724504706207744</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Dear <a href="/hashtag/Essex?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Essex</b></a> followers, Have your say on what gets extra investment in Essex Police by taking part in the public survey: <a href="https://t.co/PhfiTMgDQo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://surveys.essexinsight.org.uk/policeprecept" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://surveys.essexinsight.org.uk/policeprecept"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">surveys.essexinsight.org.uk/policeprecept</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>  DEADLINE 19th NOV</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Dominic Raab Retweeted Steve Baker MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I agree. Colleagues today were reasonable and constructive. We are working together to get this important legislation right.<a href="https://t.co/LUgfS3lRjB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/stevebakerhw/status/930574673796100096" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/stevebakerhw/status/930574673796100096"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/stevebakerhw/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/930574673796100096</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

It actually looks like a black conservative hanging from a tree.  Whether or not she meant that, its not behaviour becoming of an MP.<a href="https://t.co/GUFLp2RndC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/guidofawkes/status/930454748498669569" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/guidofawkes/status/930454748498669569"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/guidofawkes/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/930454748498669569</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Sunder Katwala Retweeted Kemi Badenoch MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I think Clive Lewis is badly wrong to say you can not 'fight racism and be in the Conservative party'. It does a disservice to anti-racism to argue that anti-prejudice norms are the property of one political party<a href="https://t.co/Q2kJVWTAAA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/status/930418625281961984" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/status/930418625281961984"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/930418625281961984</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Remi Adekoya Retweeted Kemi Badenoch MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Mr Lewis's tweet, naturally, contains the kind of deep-sounding phrases those who like to think anti-racism is sole preserve of Left, love using: things like "the structural reality of modern racism". In other words, y'all don't "get it" like we do.<a href="https://t.co/u7UTRbAQOH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/status/930418625281961984" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/status/930418625281961984"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/KemiBadenoch/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/930418625281961984</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">14. My message to young black people everywhere is please, please feel free to be who you want to be.  Don't let Labour's stereotypes and low expectations hold you back and never let them treat you like black sheep who will always follow them.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">12. It's the attitude I referred to in my conference speech -that you can't be black and conservative.<a href="https://t.co/FTqPiiILXS" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/FTqPiiILXS</a></p>

      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">
  <div class="AdaptiveMedia-videoContainer">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">EDCs comments were profoundly distressing, and a toxic reminder of  the struggle black people face daily in defeating stereotypes.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The final words from Passchendaele. 

The <a href="/CWGC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="56189259"><s>@</s><b>CWGC</b></a> cares for more than 76,000 men and one woman who fell during the Third Battle of Ypres in <span class="twitter-hashflag-container"><a href="/hashtag/Belgium?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Belgium</b></a><a href="/hashtag/Belgium?src=hash" dir="ltr"><img class="twitter-hashflag" src="https://abs.twimg.com/hashflags/wp2016_BEL/wp2016_BEL.png" draggable="false" alt="" /></a></span>. Here are some of the final words from their families. 

Find out more, here: <a href="https://t.co/Hdk6piFSCr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/YxpE30guGJg" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/YxpE30guGJg"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/YxpE30guGJg</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> 

<a href="/hashtag/Passchendaele100?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Passchendaele100</b></a><a href="https://t.co/X6jPAcOAZi" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/X6jPAcOAZi</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        " data-autoplaying-media="false">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">They certainly don't make 'em like they used to.  <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2764.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Heavy red heart" aria-label="Emoji: Heavy red heart" />
Rest in Peace <a href="/hashtag/Benson?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Benson</b></a><a href="https://t.co/yuBadDJPa9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/youngsinick/status/922944670522597376" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/youngsinick/status/922944670522597376"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/youngsinick/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/922944670522597376</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/youngsinick/status/922944670522597376" data-conversation-id="922944670522597376" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="922944670522597376" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="youngsinick" data-user-id="22111533" href="/youngsinick/status/922944670522597376" data-conversation-id="922944670522597376" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
              <div class="QuoteMedia-videoPreview">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Michael Arceneaux</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>youngsinick</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">A legend. Rest well, Robert Guillaume.

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Its not often I get to speak on free markets -my fav subject.  Thank you for having me, <a href="/ASI" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14304714"><s>@</s><b>ASI</b></a> . Fantastic crowd...and all under 30!<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f44f.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Clapping hands sign" aria-label="Emoji: Clapping hands sign" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f44f.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Clapping hands sign" aria-label="Emoji: Clapping hands sign" /><a href="https://t.co/t5x9KPf3zO" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/gabrielcsgavin/status/917814068311941121" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/gabrielcsgavin/status/917814068311941121"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/gabrielcsgavin</span><span class="invisible">/status/917814068311941121</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">This isn't the audience for the <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4010545737"><s>@</s><b>KemiBadenoch</b></span> speech at the <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14304714"><s>@</s><b>ASI</b></span> tonight. This is the overflow room watching that speech downstairs. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/KkFt4MTd31</span></div>
        </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It was a pleasure to be there!  It's a lovely venue and a great addition to the village.<a href="https://t.co/W2YCBZy7OC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/radwinterpav/status/916348221978566656" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/radwinterpav/status/916348221978566656"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/radwinterpav/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/916348221978566656</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/RadwinterPav/status/916348221978566656" data-conversation-id="916348221978566656" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="916348221978566656" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="RadwinterPav" data-user-id="910150207488380928" href="/RadwinterPav/status/916348221978566656" data-conversation-id="916348221978566656" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DLeFWYeWAAAQ4-5.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,54,51,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,54,51]">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Radwinter Pavilion</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>RadwinterPav</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">New Pavilion officially opened today with reception attended by project team, funders, local <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Radwinter</b></span> residents, and our MP <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4010545737"><s>@</s><b>KemiBadenoch</b></span>. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Mn053CKkHw</span></div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleasure to be on the panel with <a href="/OpenEurope" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="65322179"><s>@</s><b>OpenEurope</b></a> discussing Britain beyond Brexit <a href="/hashtag/CPC17?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CPC17</b></a><a href="https://t.co/wHuZdrfcop" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/openeurope/status/915257860845576197" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/openeurope/status/915257860845576197"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/openeurope/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/915257860845576197</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="911530599437017088" id="stream-item-tweet-911530599437017088" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;911530599437017088&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Keep your shame to your side of the house -I'm delighted to have been elected onto science committee today by <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> MPs &amp; on merit<a href="https://t.co/MMUZw1Vwdk" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/yvettecoopermp/status/907947257709912064" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/yvettecoopermp/status/907947257709912064"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/yvettecoopermp</span><span class="invisible">/status/907947257709912064</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="902118672118026240" id="stream-item-tweet-902118672118026240" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;902118672118026240&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted BrexitCentral</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Today, I stood down from the <a href="/LondonAssembly" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117521477"><s>@</s><b>LondonAssembly</b></a>. Will miss @Assembly_Tories. Best of luck to  <a href="/Councillorsuzie" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="275455326"><s>@</s><b>Councillorsuzie</b></a> who will be a fantastic member!<a href="https://t.co/S7jxg1CMMl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/joannefortown/status/877130040579936256" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/joannefortown/status/877130040579936256"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/joannefortown/</span><span class="invisible">status/877130040579936256</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Toby Young</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I told you "Tories for Corbyn" was a bad idea!! <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f621.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Pouting face" aria-label="Emoji: Pouting face" /><a href="https://t.co/mA27l50Il9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/toadmeister/status/873161976704315393" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/toadmeister/status/873161976704315393"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/toadmeister/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/873161976704315393</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4"><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f633.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flushed face" aria-label="Emoji: Flushed face" />Don't know whether to laugh or cry at idea of Abbott running Home Office. Her views on immigration and policing are spine-chillingly awful.<a href="https://t.co/vsIstWSt0z" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/katyballs/status/864434302599278592" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/katyballs/status/864434302599278592"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/katyballs/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/864434302599278592</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="863685722418688001" id="stream-item-tweet-863685722418688001" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;863685722418688001&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Tim Stanley</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Labour think they own minorities. In 2010, their activists shouted at me "How can you support tories after everything we've done for you!?"<a href="https://t.co/hdFpF2XrTj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/timothy_stanley/status/863417478663352320" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/timothy_stanley/status/863417478663352320"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/timothy_stanle</span><span class="invisible">y/status/863417478663352320</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="861293947313946624" id="stream-item-tweet-861293947313946624" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;861293947313946624&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-860228634992406529">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations <a href="/ReshamKotecha" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="814984682"><s>@</s><b>ReshamKotecha</b></a> !  One of the nicest people in politics. Clever and hard working.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted Justin Hinchcliffe</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Sorry, I was 5 months pregnant and had just had surgery.  Love politics and campaigning but even I have my limits! <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f600.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Grinning face" aria-label="Emoji: Grinning face" /><a href="https://t.co/YotFNZn0bN" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/londonn17justin/status/856992437058904065" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/londonn17justin/status/856992437058904065"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/londonn17justi</span><span class="invisible">n/status/856992437058904065</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Kemi Badenoch MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Glad <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4010545737"><s>@</s><b>KemiBadenoch</b></span> didn't get Hampstead.When I asked her to campaign in Haringey (via L Kelly),she said we were too far.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We can easily take the police for granted. Here is a reminder that, when necessary, they place themselves between danger and the rest of us.</p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="1150">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1.2K</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thank you <a href="/ICE_London" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="216744590"><s>@</s><b>ICE_London</b></a> for asking me to join the selection panel. </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">My deepest sympathies to all those affected by the horrific Croydon tram crash today. Wishing injured passengers a full and speedy recovery.</p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweet</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-783949251726417920">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="780105555218206722" data-item-id="780105555218206722" data-permalink-path="/KemiBadenoch/status/780105555218206722" data-conversation-id="780105555218206722" data-tweet-nonce="780105555218206722-509d9c45-a57c-46fe-ab5b-52b224619c1e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="KemiBadenoch" data-name="Kemi Badenoch MP" data-user-id="4010545737" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4010545737&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KemiBadenoch&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="776086767338393600" data-item-id="776086767338393600" data-permalink-path="/GLAConservative/status/776086767338393600" data-conversation-id="776086767338393600" data-tweet-nonce="776086767338393600-8af46b48-a362-4152-88d5-3b1a1ef2ead3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="776139553887363072" data-retweeter="KemiBadenoch" data-screen-name="GLAConservative" data-name="GLA Conservatives" data-user-id="358109443" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="EveningStandard" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;358109443&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GLAConservative&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;GLA Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;GLA Conservatives&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;GLA Conservatives&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4010545737&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KemiBadenoch&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1168472395&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;EveningStandard&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Evening Standard&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Evening Standard&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Evening Standard&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">An open letter to the <a href="/EveningStandard" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1168472395"><s>@</s><b>EveningStandard</b></a> following their inflammatory front page story on Tues <a href="https://t.co/jH7i3ONabR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://glaconservatives.co.uk/opinion/an-open-letter-to-the-evening-standard/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://glaconservatives.co.uk/opinion/an-open-letter-to-the-evening-standard/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">glaconservatives.co.uk/opinion/an-ope</span><span class="invisible">n-letter-to-the-evening-standard/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/ohje5iZExZ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ohje5iZExZ</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I wonder if <a href="/EveningStandard" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1168472395"><s>@</s><b>EveningStandard</b></a> has any black writers? Pretty sure <a href="/metpoliceuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="66967746"><s>@</s><b>metpoliceuk</b></a> could teach them a thing or two about diversity!   </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">We need more <a href="/hashtag/StopandSearch?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StopandSearch</b></a> in London. </div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Suddenly, my Twitter feed is full of leftwingers who don't like a democratic vote and are worried about the reaction of the "markets". Wow.</p>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Please support my series of podcasts on mayoral election in association with <a href="/littleatoms" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2976625727"><s>@</s><b>littleatoms</b></a> + spread word! <a href="/Indiegogo" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="34732474"><s>@</s><b>indiegogo</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ztiuZpoOs4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://igg.me/at/londonelections/13784559" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://igg.me/at/londonelections/13784559"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">igg.me/at/londonelect</span><span class="invisible">ions/13784559</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Michael White Retweeted London Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Awkward timing of a <a href="/Twitter" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="783214"><s>@</s><b>twitter</b></a> ad just as <a href="/TfL" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="47319664"><s>@</s><b>TfL</b></a> confirms a 1.9bn black hole in <a href="/SadiqKhan" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19397942"><s>@</s><b>SadiqKhan</b></a>'s plans. <a href="/hashtag/londondebate?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>londondebate</b></a><a href="https://t.co/nmPe1EP1px" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/londonlabour/status/717408285574475776" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/londonlabour/status/717408285574475776"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/londonlabour/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/717408285574475776</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Michael White added,</p>

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted David Dean</p>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PippaCrerar" data-user-id="130120037">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/KemiBadenoch" data-user-id="4010545737">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/667795116787150850/W6r4dYgR_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Kemi Badenoch MP Retweeted GLA Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Proud to receive this petition on behalf of <a href="/WimbledonNews" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="36037524"><s>@</s><b>WimbledonNews</b></a> and 5,000 residents.         <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"This govt is putting more money in rail infrastructure than any previous one since 1948" - Sir Peter Hendy at assembly transport committee</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The <a href="/spectator" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="16683666"><s>@</s><b>spectator</b></a> "What's that thing?" award for Britain's worst public art <a href="https://t.co/5CoiFzDMfO" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://specc.ie/1Pj6uRQ" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://specc.ie/1Pj6uRQ"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">specc.ie/1Pj6uRQ</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> had me in <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f606.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Smiling face with open mouth and tightly-closed eyes" aria-label="Emoji: Smiling face with open mouth and tightly-closed eyes" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f606.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Smiling face with open mouth and tightly-closed eyes" aria-label="Emoji: Smiling face with open mouth and tightly-closed eyes" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f602.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Face with tears of joy" aria-label="Emoji: Face with tears of joy" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f602.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Face with tears of joy" aria-label="Emoji: Face with tears of joy" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f602.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Face with tears of joy" aria-label="Emoji: Face with tears of joy" /></p>

    <div class="dropdown">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

  </ul>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">

  </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="1003">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1.0K</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-680346133265256449">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">66</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">66</span>
  </span>

  </button>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">So not just me who heard it! If Labour's transport spokesman is to be believed, Sadiq may extend congestion charge.<a href="https://t.co/mJUvSlW1jl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/mayorwatch/status/677094844615933952" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/mayorwatch/status/677094844615933952"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/mayorwatch/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/677094844615933952</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/henrynelless" data-user-id="255188026">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/961292632663175170/sAq6yBdP_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">My biggest worry on the rise of Corbyn. If <a href="/hashtag/ge2015?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ge2015</b></a> is like 92 election, then 2020 could be like 97...<a href="https://t.co/9N3SHdZdCp" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/andrew__kennedy/status/672691792505098241" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/andrew__kennedy/status/672691792505098241"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/andrew__kenned</span><span class="invisible">y/status/672691792505098241</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Working with <a href="/SurvivorsUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="749019253"><s>@</s><b>SurvivorsUK</b></a> found astounding figures, 92,000 incidents of male rape and sexual assault go unreported<a href="https://t.co/UgNHKSUBej" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://glaconservatives.co.uk/news/92000-incidents-of-sexual-assault-against-men-are-going-unreported/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://glaconservatives.co.uk/news/92000-incidents-of-sexual-assault-against-men-are-going-unreported/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">glaconservatives.co.uk/news/92000-inc</span><span class="invisible">idents-of-sexual-assault-against-men-are-going-unreported/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="657300545074544640" data-item-id="657300545074544640" data-permalink-path="/MrJacHart/status/657300545074544640" data-conversation-id="657300545074544640" data-tweet-nonce="657300545074544640-34e7aeb3-64f0-4920-940d-72021afeaa7f" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="657309767359156225" data-retweeter="KemiBadenoch" data-screen-name="MrJacHart" data-name="Jack Hart" data-user-id="72605514" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="KemiBadenoch" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;72605514&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;MrJacHart&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Jack Hart&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Jack Hart&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Jack Hart&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4010545737&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;KemiBadenoch&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Kemi Badenoch MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">
